page.title: 06POLICE STATION,HIGHWORTH
page.content: The police station is quite new.It was built about 1970.The old one was based at the police houses in Grove Hill. There are seven policemen,including one woman and two sargeants.The police station has got two computers and a printer.They have got two vans and one car but no cells.The station covers a lot of land area like Castle Eaton, Hannington,Inglesham, Highworth, Blunsdon, Stanton Fitzwarren and South Marston.There are a lot more policemen in other parts of Wiltshire.When Highworth has a festival the policemen from Highworth have to call out some policemen from the other parts of Wiltshire.
